abstract: Funds advised by the private equity firm Apax Partners are acquiring all of the Trader Media Group, which operates the automobile website AutoTrader in Britain and other online auto sales brands.
snippet: Funds advised by the private equity firm Apax Partners are acquiring all of the Trader Media Group, which operates the automobile website AutoTrader in Britain and other online auto sales brands.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Funds advised by the European private equity firm Apax Partners agreed on Tuesday to buy out its joint venture partner and acquired the stake it did not own in the Trader Media Group, which operates the automobile website AutoTrader in Britain and other online brands.

headline.main: Apax Partners to Acquire All of Online Auto Sales Company Trader Media
